roleset.name: argue against
roleset.note: MILITATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'militate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from militate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: If the figures show a hefty rise in inflation, they could militate against easing by the Fed.
example.arg: If the figures show a hefty rise in inflation
